title: RiotPlan Configuration
description: Configuration file for RiotPlan - a framework for long-lived, stateful AI workflows

planDirectory.description: Path to the directory where plans are stored. Can be relative (resolved from config file location) or absolute. Defaults to './plans' if not specified.

defaultProvider.description: Default AI provider to use for plan generation when not specified via CLI flags or tool parameters.

defaultModel.description: Default model to use for plan generation. If not specified, uses provider defaults.

templateDirectory.description: Path to custom plan templates directory. Can be relative (resolved from config file location) or absolute. If not specified, uses built-in templates.
